precondition: The Windows 98 desktop is visible.
action: Click the "Start" button on the taskbar.
expected_results: The Start menu will open, displaying a list of menus and options.

precondition: The "Printers" option is visible in the Start Menu's "Settings" submenu.
expected_results: The "Printers" folder will open and its window will be maximized.

precondition: The "Printers" folder window is open and the "Add Printer" icon is visible.
action: Double Left Click on the "Add Printer" icon.
expected_results: The "Add Printer Wizard" dialog box will open. This dialog box will contain a title bar, an image of a printer, instructional text, and three buttons: "< Back", "Next >", and "Cancel".

precondition: The "Add Printer Wizard" window is open and displays the message "This wizard will help you to install your printer quickly and easily. To begin installing your printer, click Next."
expected_results: The "Add Printer Wizard" window will update to display options for selecting a printer manufacturer and model.

precondition: The "Add Printer Wizard" window is open, and the "AGFA" manufacturer is selected.
action: Click on the "AGFA-AccuSet 800SF v2013.108" printer model in the "Printers" list.
expected_results: The selected printer model will be highlighted.

precondition: The "Add Printer Wizard" window is open, displaying lists for "Manufacturers:" and "Printers:". The "Next >" button is active.
expected_results: The Add Printer Wizard will advance to the next step in the installation process.

precondition: The "Add Printer Wizard" window is open, displaying a list of printer manufacturers and models. The "Next >" button is active.
expected_results: The Add Printer Wizard will advance to the next step in the installation process.

precondition: The "Add Printer Wizard" window is open, displaying a list of printer manufacturers and models. The "Printers" list should show models from your desired manufacturer.
expected_results: The "Add Printer Wizard" will advance to the next step in the installation process.

precondition: The "Add Printer Wizard" window is open with the "Manufacturers" and "Printers" lists visible.
action: Click the down arrow button on the "Printers" list box.
expected_results: The list of available printer models will scroll down, showing more options.

precondition: The "Add Printer Wizard" window is open, displaying the "Manufacturers" and "Printers" lists.
action: Click the "Next >" button located below the printer lists.
expected_results: The Add Printer Wizard will proceed to the next step of the installation process.

precondition: The Add Printer Wizard window is open. The "Manufacturers" pane is visible on the left, and the "Printers" pane on the right. The "AGFA" manufacturer is currently selected.
expected_results: The "Printers" pane will be updated to display a list of HP printer models.

precondition: The "Add Printer Wizard" dialog box is open with the "Manufacturers" and "Printers" list boxes visible.
action: Move the mouse pointer over the down arrow button located to the right of the "Printers" list box.
expected_results: The mouse pointer's position will change to hover over the down arrow button.

precondition: The "Add Printer Wizard" window is open, displaying the "Manufacturers" and "Printers" list boxes.
action: Click the "Next >" button located below the "Manufacturers" and "Printers" list boxes.
expected_results: The Add Printer Wizard will advance to the next step in the installation process.

precondition: The "Add Printer Wizard" window is open, displaying a list of printer manufacturers in the "Manufacturers" pane and a list of available "Printers" in the "Printers" pane.
action: Click on the "HP" item in the "Manufacturers" list.
expected_results: The "Printers" list will update to display HP printer models. An empty "Undo" window will appear to the right of the "Add Printer Wizard" window.

precondition: The "Add Printer Wizard" window is open with "HP" selected in the "Manufacturers:" list.
action: Click on "HP Color LaserJet 5/5M PS" in the "Printers:" list.
expected_results: The selection in the "Printers:" list will change to "HP Color LaserJet 5/5M PS".

precondition: The "Add Printer Wizard" dialog box is open, displaying a list of printer manufacturers and models. The "HP Color LaserJet 5/5M PS" printer model is selected.
expected_results: The "Add Printer Wizard" dialog box will display a list of available ports for printer connection. The "LPT1: Printer Port" option will be selected by default. The "Configure Port..." button will become available, and the "Have Disk..." button will no longer be visible.

precondition: The "Add Printer Wizard" window is open and the "LPT1: Printer Port" is selected.
expected_results: The "Add Printer Wizard" window will advance to the next step. A text field labeled "Printer name:" will appear, pre-filled with "HP Color LaserJet 5/5M PS".

precondition: The "Add Printer Wizard" window is open and displays a text field labeled "Printer name:" and three buttons: "< Back", "Next >", and "Cancel".
expected_results: The "Add Printer Wizard" window will update to a confirmation screen. The "Next >" button will be replaced with a "Finish" button.

precondition: The "Add Printer Wizard" window is open and displays the "Do you want to print a test page?" prompt with options "Yes (recommended)" and "No".
expected_results: The "No" radio button will be selected.

precondition: The "Add Printer Wizard" dialog box is open and the "Would you like to print a test page?" prompt is displayed.
expected_results: The option to skip printing a test page after installation will be selected.

precondition: The "Add Printer Wizard" window is open and the "Finish" button is active.
expected_results: The "Add Printer Wizard" window will close, and a "Copying Files" dialog box will appear. An "Insert Disk" error message may also appear.

precondition: An error message box titled "Insert Disk" is displayed with the message: "Please insert the disk labeled 'Windows 98 Second Edition CD-ROM', and then click OK."
expected_results: The "Insert Disk" error message box will close, and a "Copying Files..." window will appear.

precondition: A "Copying Files..." dialog box is open, indicating that the file "ICONLIB.DLL" cannot be found and prompting to insert the "Windows 98 Second Edition CD-ROM". The dialog box should also include a text field labeled "Copy files from:" displaying "D:\\WIN98".
expected_results: The "Copying Files..." dialog box will indicate an error stating that a file cannot be found on the Windows 98 installation CD. The dialog box will prompt the user to check the disk and click OK.

precondition: An error message window titled "Copying Files..." is open, displaying the message: "The file 'ICONLIB.DLL' on 'Windows 98 Second Edition CD-ROM' cannot be found. Setup cannot find the source disk. Please make sure that the disk is inserted properly, and then click OK to continue."
expected_results: A progress bar will appear in the "Copying Files..." window, indicating the file copying process has begun. A small "Copying Files..." window will appear in the bottom right corner of the screen.

precondition: A dialog box titled 'Copying Files...' is open, displaying the error message: 'The file 'ICONLIB.DLL' on 'Windows 98 Second Edition CD-ROM' cannot be found. Setup cannot find the source disk. Please make sure that the disk is inserted properly, and then click OK to continue.'
expected_results: The 'Copying Files...' dialog box will close. An error message titled 'HP Color LaserJet 5/5M PS' will appear, stating that not all required files were copied. The message advises quitting all programs and trying again, or selecting a different printer model.

precondition: An error message box titled "HP Color LaserJet 5/5M PS" is displayed.
expected_results: The error message box will close.
